name: Incident Analysis
format: On {when}, the alert '{what}' was triggered at {where}. The investigation determined that the root cause was '{why}', involving '{who}'.

name: Security Alert
format: On {when}, the security event '{what}' occurred at {where}. Analysis identified '{why}' as the cause, with actions involving '{who}'.

name: Operational Event
format: At {where} on {when}, the event '{what}' was identified. The root cause analysis pointed to '{why}', with contributions from '{who}'.
